title: Spellbound
description: You are unable to attack or use skills, and receive {0} Rosemary Beans at the end of combat.

title: Alchemy Accident
description: Bombs randomly drop on the battlefield, dealing {1} unavoidable damage to all nearby units after {0}s.

title: Undercooked Rosemary Bean
description: Lose {1} health for every {0} pickups of Rosemary Beans.

title: Root Entanglement
description: Unable to move and take {0}% less damage. This effect is temporarily disabled for {1}s after using a skill.

name: More aggressive enemies!
title: Feral Enemies
description: More aggressive enemies!

name: No pets or mercenaries
title: Lone Wolf
description: No pets or mercenaries

name: Bad Luck
title: Bad Luck
description: You are jinxed!

name: First three purchases in dungeon are free
Miasma
description: Turn invisible but gain stacks within miasmas. Lose HP if stacks max.

name: Bombs and coins spawn in chests when you clear a room (except for boss rooms).
title: Bomb Chest
description: Bombs and coins spawn in chests when you clear a room (except for boss rooms).

name: Boom Boom Boom
title: Boom Boom Boom
description: Complete the game once. And in this game, both enemies and players explode upon death. The explosion deals damage to players.\n\n

name: Crate Mutation
description: Some crates in levels will become special chests.

name: Increase critical damage
title: Dagger Frenzy
description: Increase critical damage

name: Vision is limited
title: Nearsighted
description: Vision is limited

name: Deja Vu
title: Deja Vu
description: You may encounter levels that you have encountered before.

name: Fight with 2 slightly nerfed bosses in each Boss room
title: Boss Duo
description: Fight with 2 slightly nerfed bosses in each Boss room

name: Skill cooldown +100%
title: Double Cooldown
description: Skill cooldown +100%

name: Weapon crit rate +100%, crit damage -50%
title: Precision Booster
description: Weapon crit rate +100%, crit damage -50%

name: Enemy debuff time -50%
title: Vigorous Enemies
description: Enemy debuff time -50%

name: Enemy defense +1
title: Tough Enemies
description: Enemy defense +1

name: Enemy HP +100%
title: Double Joy
description: Enemy HP +100%

name: Monsters shift to a different position the moment they get hit
title: Blinking Enemies
description: Monsters shift to a different position the moment they get hit

name: Monsters split into two when their HP is below 50%
title: Cell Division
description: Monsters split into two when their HP is below 50%

name: Elite enemies appear more often
title: Full Alert
description: Elite enemies appear more often

name: When you take a hit, a random debuff will be applied to you. The effect only triggers once every 5 seconds.
title: Elemental Anomaly
description: When you take a hit, a random debuff will be applied to you. The effect only triggers once every 5 seconds.

name: Character damage taken +1. Enemy damage taken +2. Can be obtained up to 10 times.
title: Double Edge (Lord of Evil)
description: Character damage taken +1. Enemy damage taken +2. Can be obtained up to 10 times.

name: Enemies move faster, but will be stunned from time to time.
title: Sprinting Enemies
description: Enemies move faster, but will be stunned from time to time.

name: Enemy fire rate up!
title: Wild Enemies
description: Enemy fire rate up!

name: Weapon fire rate +100%, attack -50%
title: Speed Booster
description: Weapon fire rate +100%, attack -50%

name: Rift in Time and Space
title: Rift in Time and Space
description: Complete the game once. And in this game monsters, upon death, have a chance to open a rift of time and space. You will take damage if you fall into the rift.

name: A bonus room in each level
title: Genie Lamp
description: A bonus room in each level

name: A mount awaits when you enter a new biome.
title: Beastmaster
description: A mount awaits when you enter a new biome.

name: Get a weapon when entering a new biome
title: Mythical Artifact
description: Get a weapon when entering a new biome

name: Good Luck
title: Good Luck
description: Today is your lucky day!

name: Skill cooldown -50%
title: Halved Cooldown
description: Skill cooldown -50%

name: Better defense, but armor does not regenerate during combat.
title: Shell Protection
description: Better defense, but armor does not regenerate during combat.

name: Gigantism
title: Giant Form
description: Become larger and gain extra health and armor, but move slower.

name: Pet is gigantic, more aggressive and deals higher damage.
title: Gigantic Pet
description: Pet is gigantic, more aggressive and deals higher damage.

name: Increases enemy resistance to control effects. Can be obtained up to 10 times.
title: Immunity Gene (Lord of Evil)
description: Increases enemy resistance to control effects. Can be obtained up to 10 times.

name: Inferior Medicament
title: Inferior Medicament
description: All recovery -50%

name: Infinite energy
title: Infinite Energy
description: Infinite energy

name: Store price +100%
title: Exorbitant Price
description: Store price +100%

name: More enemies in the dungeon
title: Strength in Numbers
description: More enemies in the dungeon

name: Destined
title: Destined
description: Complete the game once, and in this game, the whole team (all the team members combined) can't revive more than 2 times. If one is revived by a weapon or a challenge condition, it is not counted as one revival consumed.\n

name: Chance to revive all teammates upon killing enemies.
title: Resurrection (Lord of Evil)
description: Chance to revive all teammates upon killing enemies.

name: Max energy -50%
title: Energy Decay
description: Max energy -50%

name: Max HP =1
title: Fragility
description: Max HP =1

name: Buff slot -1, but option +1 when you choose buffs.
title: Buff Choice +1
description: Buff slot -1, but option +1 when you choose buffs.

name: Buff slot +1, but option -1 when you choose buffs.
title: Buff Slot +1
description: Buff slot +1, but option -1 when you choose buffs.

name: More rooms in the dungeon
title: Dungeon Expansion
description: Each level may contain an extra battle room.

name: Melee weapons only
title: Melee Only
description: Melee weapons only

name: Meridian Disorder
title: Meridian Disorder
description: Max armor and max HP are fixed at 1. Max energy is fixed at 999.

name: Monster Bomber
title: Monster Bomber
description: Complete the game once. And in this game, from time to time, a bomber will fly across the room and bombard everyone in it, including monsters.

name: Killing Spree
title: Killing Spree
description: You get stronger as you acquire a killstreak.

name: Max number of buffs +3
title: Exceptionally Talented
description: Max number of buffs +3

name: Options +2 when you choose buffs
title: Buff Buffet
description: Options +2 when you choose buffs

name: Spawn chance of mutated enemies +2%. Can be obtained up to 10 times.
title: Gene Mutation (Lord of Evil)
description: Spawn chance of mutated enemies +2%. Can be obtained up to 10 times.

name: You can worship multiple statues
title: Multiple Statues
description: You can worship multiple statues

name: Can only carry one weapon
title: One Hand
description: Can only carry one weapon

name: Functional UI is disabled
title: Imperception
description: Functional UI is disabled

name: May switch character when you enter a new level
title: Multiple Personalities
description: May switch character when you enter a new level

name: You can resurrect twice
title: Revive Me
description: Gains +1 revival chance.

name: Cancels 1 increased Pressure Level's weight on enemy resistance to control effects. Can be obtained up to 10 times.
title: Weaken (Lord of Evil)
description: Cancels 1 increased Pressure Level's weight on enemy resistance to control effects. Can be obtained up to 10 times.

name: Movement speed of enemies -1%. Can be obtained up to 10 times.
title: Slow (Lord of Evil)
description: Movement speed of enemies -1%. Can be obtained up to 10 times.

name: Weapons get reforged at the start of each level
title: Reforge Weapon
description: Weapons get reforged at the start of each level

name: Meridian Patency
title: Meridian Patency
description: Attack speed +10%, health +1, movement speed +10%, and crit hit rate +5%.

title: Knight's Return
description: 2 free revivals and +100 max energy in the returning level.

title: Teamwork Dreamwork
description: Max HP +1; Max energy +20.

name: Sales Day
title: Sales Day
description: Trader's special sale is on!

name: Random levels
title: Sleepwalk
description: Random levels

name: Weapon attack +100%, fire rate -50%
title: Muscle Booster
description: Weapon attack +100%, fire rate -50%

name: Distorted Space
title: Distorted Space
description: Complete the game once. And in this game, you will get bigger or smaller from time to time. You move slower if you grow bigger, and you move faster once you shrink smaller.\n

name: Regenerate HP when it's below 50%
title: Regeneration
description: Regenerate HP when it's below 50%

name: Time Fluctuation
title: Time Fluctuation
description: Your movement speed randomly increases or decreases.

name: Complete the game within {0} minutes on Normal difficulty or {1} minutes on Badass difficulty.\n
title: Matrix Racer
description: Complete the game once. And in this game you should finish a run within 12 minutes on Normal difficulty or 16 minutes on Badass difficulty.\n

name: Dwarfism
title: Shrinkage
description: Become smaller and lose health and armor, but move faster.

name: Most Wanted
title: Most Wanted
description: Complete the game once. And in this game you will run into a bigger elite monster in each battle room.

name: Homing Laser
description: A beam of laser will appear regularly, tracking you and dealing damage to both you and your enemies!
Complete the game once. And in this game volcanic rocks will pelt down on you. These rocks deal no damage to enemies.\n

name: All weapons are equipped with attachments
title: Attachment Master
description: All weapons are equipped with attachments

name: Weapon Overheating
title: Weapon Overheating
description: The fire rate of weapons that discharge projectiles reduces after consecutive attacks.

name: Config Error
title: Config Error
description: Only one type of enemy will appear in each room.

name: Blessing Staff
title: Blessing Staff
description: Revive with HP reduced to 1. Melee weapon damage +1.

name: Do you want to refresh the set of challenges?
Curse of Grave Robbers
title: Curse of Grave Robbers
description: You won't be immune to poison. The next 4 boxes will be empty.

name: Tenacity
title: Tenacity
description: Staff weapon damage +1. Immune to traps.

name: Frostbite
title: Frostbite
description: Armor regenerates more slowly and you won't be immune to freeze

title: Matrix of the Lord of Evil
description: [Mode] Matrix of the Lord of Evil

name: Strong Body
title: Strong Body
description: Armor regenerates faster and you are immune to freeze

name: Drillmaster is secretly helping you. The challenge condition will be effective for {0} more games.\nIn the multiplayer mode, it does not work but a stack will be consumed. This challenge condition will be removed from the season mode and the Badass difficulty level.
Deranged
title: Deranged
description: When HP reduces, Tentacles of the Past spawn around you. And you won't be immune to freeze, fire or poison.
